quickWins.title: Fix data communication issues on 8 meter(s)

impact.description: Missing data prevents accurate monitoring and may hide energy waste

quickWins.description: 8 meter(s) have high-severity data issues: CDKH_Kitchen Panel(small)_WCDS_Wilson Ctr, RTU-3_WCDS_Wilson Ctr, CDPK_Kitchen Main Panel(s)_WCDS_Wilson Ctr. This prevents accurate energy monitoring and may be hiding consumption anomalies.
recommendations: Check network connectivity and power to affected meters
Verify meter configuration and data logging settings
Contact meter vendor if issues persist
Consider replacing meters with repeated failures

load_shift_opportunity.description: Shifting 2279.0 kWh from on-peak to off-peak could save up to $319.11/period

recommendations.title: Shift non-critical weekday loads
recommendations.detail: Weekday peak (32 kW) is 2.4x higher than weekend (13 kW). Consider shifting batch processes, HVAC pre-cooling, or EV charging to off-peak hours.

recommendations.title: Target peak concentration hours
recommendations.detail: Demand peaks concentrate around 14:00, 17:00, 18:00. Stagger equipment startup or use demand-limiting controls during these hours to reduce the billing peak.
